comment.author: 66982277@N00
comment._content: I believe this may be Abington, MA at the Island Grove Pond. The White Structure in the back looks a lot like the bridge which spans it,(http://www.flickr.com/photos/bunkosquad/300282044/in/set-667536/) and the little stone hut is located at the same spot now, housing park equipment.

comment.author: 28415315@N02
comment._content: Ya Jeanne-Erin, it's definitely Island Grove. I saw this picture last night, so this morning I took a picture. The monument isn't as obvious in my picture as in this one, but I'm positive it's Island Grove. The original might have been taken from on the ice. www.flickr.com/photos/dananderson/3128605154/
